document_data.name: Madame Darkness
document_data.mainbody: '''Madame Darkness''' was a fortune teller in the [[Moonsea]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/No Foolish Matter|10}}
document_data.Activities: Madame Darkness was the fortune teller in [[Doctor Jubal's Carnival of Curiosities]]. Her visions were always vague but after twilight her responses had a hint of menace.
document_data.History: Madame Darkness escaped the [[Underdark]] ''circa'' [[1486 DR]] and joined the Carnival. She sensed something strange from the new mirror maze attraction.
